name: pentameter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a line in poetry which has five stressed syllables; the rhythm of poetry with five stressed syllables in a line: Most of Shakespeare's verse is written in iambic pentameter (= five pairs of syllables with an unstressed syllable followed by a stressed syllable). Compare
hexameter
tetrameter
